alert.note: Alert for Knott; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:34AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Perry and central Knott Counties through 315 AM EDT... At 234 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cordia, or near Hazard, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ritchie, Emmalena, Elic and Talcum around 240 AM EDT. Carrie and Bearville around 245 AM EDT. Hindman, Tina and Amburgey around 250 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Leburn, Ivis, Brinkley, Mallie, Yellow Mountain, Vest, Garner, Soft Shell, Pippa Passes, Larkslane, Hollybush, Mousie, Bolyn, Handshoe, Kite and Topmost. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
